en.title: FE Supports Pertubuhan Hospice Seremban.
en.content:
REPORT FROM FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR KENNY YICK.

FE is proud to donate RM 3,000 and 10 Quantum Pendants to the Hospice Seremban Charity Golf Event at Seremban International Golf Club (SIGC) on 29th March 2009. Hospice Seremban is a non-governmental and non-religious organization rendering free services to alleviate the sufferings of terminally ill cancer patients. A team of dedicated doctors, nurses and lay volunteers volunteer their services. The Charity Golf Event was to raise funds to pay for the Hospice's outstanding bills for a new building. It was a beautiful day for 120 golfers who participated. FE Leaders PD Kenny Yick, Pansy Yick and Samantha Wong were there to conduct the demonstration with FE's Quantum Pendant.

VIPs who attended the event were Dato' Peter Lai Yit Fee, Dato' Goh Siow Huat, Tan Sri Wong See Wah, Dato' Lim Hong Meow and Dato'Hon Mun Loong. The Captain of SIGC Hj. Mohd Yaacob Mohd Kassim also attended and is now a proud wearer of QP.

The President of Hospice Seremban, Dr. Anthony Gilbert is thankful to FE for donating to the Hospice. FE's Quantum Pendants were given out by the VIPs to golfers as Lucky Draws.

THANK YOU FE! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!
